alert.note: Alert for Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 31 at 11:17AM PST until January 01 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches with 6 to 12 inches above 5000 feet. * WHERE...Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, especially tonight as temperatures cool. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snowfall is expected after sundown from Highway 50 south to near Yerington and Hawthorne, including Highway 95.
info.instruction: Avoid travel if possible, you could be stuck in your vehicle for many hours. If you must travel, prepare for long delays and carry an emergency kit with extra food, water and clothing. If you stay home, have a backup plan in case of power outages. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
